content: I unfortunately missed the webinar from HL7 Australia from a week ago. What was the general consensus? The invite suggested a possible follow-up connectathon, is that likely to happen?
@Grahame Grieve ? (We certainly had great participation and a lot of active discussion and questions on the webinar.)
yes we are planning a connectathon in late november. Hopefully you will hear more about this later this week
there's lots of interest, and we're starting to see just why security really matters here

And I suppose this will be an in-person Connectathon so that participants can gain an invaluable understanding of today's travel reality as to better tailor solutions?
/sarcasm
